definitions.text: a musical percussion instrument; usually consists of a hollow cylinder with a membrane stretched across each end

examples: he could hear the drums before he heard the fifes

definitions.text: a bulging cylindrical shape; hollow with flat ends
a cylindrical metal container used for shipping or storage of liquids
a hollow cast-iron cylinder attached to the wheel that forms part of the brakes
small to medium-sized bottom-dwelling food and game fishes of shallow coastal and fresh waters that make a drumming noise
study intensively, as before an exam
examples: I had to bone up on my Latin verbs before the final exam
